function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of virus via respiratory droplets through close contact","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and infection","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures and use of face masks","Technologies":"Face recognition technology for contact tracing","People":"General public, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing measures leading to virus transmission","Impact":"Exponential increase in COVID-19 cases and overwhelmed healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Public education on the importance of proper social distancing","Technologies":"Mobile apps for monitoring social distancing adherence","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Uncertainty about the adequacy of social distancing recommendations","Impact":"Potential for ineffective preventive measures and continued virus transmission","Mitigation":"Continuous review and update of social distancing guidelines based on research","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring infection rates and social distancing adherence","People":"Health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Health organizations, research institutions"}]}
